articles.title: Amid 'Agnipath' Protests, Asaduddin Owaisi Has A Bulldozer Question
articles.description: Taking a swipe at the centre amid violent protests against the new military recruitment plan 'Agnipath', Hyderabad MP Asaduddin Owaisi asked how many protesters' homes will be razed by bulldozers now.
articles.content:
Asaduddin Owaisi said Nupur Sharma, who was suspended by the BJP, will soon be made a "big leader"

articles.title: ISIS Claims Kabul Gurdwara Attack, Cites Prophet's "Insult": Report
articles.description: The ISIS claimed responsibility for an attack on a Gurdwara in Afghanistan, saying it was retaliation for 'insults' to Prophet Muhammed.
articles.content:
Two people were killed and at least seven others injured in the attack.
